job_description:
we are hiring C2C java AWS Microservices position 
Role : java , AWS, microservices (these three technlogies are mandetatory)
Location: Mclean va and Non locals from EST zone 
Job Description
7+ years of experience in Design and Development of applications using Java 8+/J2EE, Spring, Spring-Boot, RESTful Services and UI Framework
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in design and development of Microservice using Spring-Boot and REST API
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge/experience in ORM Framework - JPA / Hibernate
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge and experience in Docker and Kubernetes
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in any one of the UI Framework - Angular / ReactJS
‚Ä¢ 1+ years of experience in designing and Implementing cloud-based solutions in various AWS Services (EC2, IAM, S3, Lamb
Nice to have:
‚Ä¢ Experience with OAuth implementation using Ping Identity
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with API Management (Apigee) and Service Mesh (Istio)
‚Ä¢ Experience with Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kibana
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge and experience in any Queue based implementations
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge and experience in NoSQL (MongoDB)
‚Ä¢ Experience with scripting languages using Unix, Python
Soft Skills
‚Ä¢ Fast learner of new technologies and tools.
‚Ä¢ Work independently contributing to the success of assigned project(s).
‚Ä¢ Participate in discussions with project teams to understand the application design, build process and help deploy applications in target environments.
‚Ä¢ Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent
‚Ä¢ Preferably certified in AWS.
Essential Qualifications:
Associate/Bachelor/ Master in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field.

Thanks & Regards
Soni|US IT Recruiter
D:4696630745X123
E:soni@ekcelinc.com
ai_prompt:
Write a good email to recuriter for the job description provided. Make sure to add new lines in between each para, not limited to 1 line but 3-4 lines after each para.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should start with for which position I am reaching out for. then what are my skills from jd that I have in bullet points style. lastly find my attached resume like closing statement.
4. If the jd mentioned recuriter name, start with Hello [recruiter name], else start with just Hello,
Do not send subject line in body.

Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434


Example response:


I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}

job_description:
Job Title: Full-Stack Java Developer (F2F)
Location: Cincinnati, OH (Local candidates only‚ÄîBlue Ash area)
Duration: 12 Months (Contract-to-Hire)
Client: Retail
Employment Type: C2H (Contract to Hire)
Need local candidates who can attend the F2F interview.

Job Description:
We are seeking a Fullstack Java Developer to join our dynamic engineering team for a long-term project in Cincinnati, OH. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in backend and frontend development with a focus on Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and cloud technologies (preferably Azure).

Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain fullstack applications using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Develop RESTful APIs and integrate them with frontend components.
Deploy and maintain applications on Microsoft Azure.
Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance.
Participate in Agile ceremonies and contribute to continuous improvement.

Required Skills:
Backend: Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, Microservices architecture
Frontend: Angular (preferred), TypeScript, HTML, CSS
Cloud: Microsoft Azure (or other major cloud experience)
Database: SQL/NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL)
Tools: Git, Maven/Gradle, Jenkins, JIRA
Other: Strong problem-solving and communication skills

Reach me on ishraque@vyzeinc.com

job_description:
Hi,
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

Job Title: Senior Java Developer
Location: Onsite ‚Äì McLean, VA
Experience Required: 10+ Years
 
Job Summary:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Java Developer with deep expertise in Advanced Java, PySpark, Angular (v13+), and AWS Cloud to join our technology team in McLean, VA. The ideal candidate will possess strong hands-on development skills in Spring Boot microservices and event-driven architectures using Kafka. This role requires a proactive, detail-oriented engineer capable of delivering scalable, secure, and high-performing solutions while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams.
 
Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and deploy Java-based microservices using Spring Boot.
Develop and optimize PySpark data processing pipelines for distributed systems and large-scale datasets.
Build Angular (v13+) UI components and integrate them with backend APIs.
Implement event-driven systems leveraging Kafka for streaming data solutions.
Utilize AWS services such as EC2, EKS, S3, IAM, and VPC for cloud deployment and scalability.
Collaborate with DevOps teams to implement CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and manage code repositories via Git.
Design and maintain data models for both RDBMS and NoSQL systems.
Apply best practices in coding, testing, documentation, and deployment.
Participate in Agile ceremonies, code reviews, and system design discussions.
Identify performance bottlenecks and contribute to continuous performance improvement.
 
Required Skills & Experience:
10+ years of experience in full-stack software development.
Strong expertise in Core Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices architecture.
Hands-on experience with PySpark for distributed data processing.
Proficiency in Angular (version 13 or higher) for front-end development.
Solid experience with Kafka for event streaming and messaging.
Working knowledge of AWS services including EC2, EKS, S3, IAM, and VPC.
Experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins and version control using Git.
Strong database skills in SQL and NoSQL environments.
Familiarity with Flyway or other database migration/versioning tools (preferred).
Excellent analytical, debugging, and problem-solving abilities.
Strong verbal and written communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in Agile teams.


 

 Jitendra Singh
 Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

job_description:
#Hiring#
#C2C#
Only H1B and EAD Will work
Must be local to NY OR NJ 
Having Experience with Banking or Fianancial domain

Role: Java Developer
Location: New York, NY (Onsite)
Department: Investment Banking Division (IBD) ‚Äì Fraud Technology
Duration: Long-term project
Must ‚Äì Candidate needs to travel to Morgan Stanley NY office for F2F interview
________________________________________
Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance Java-based applications for Fraud Technology systems within IBD.
‚Ä¢ Work on multithreading and database interactions to optimize application performance and reliability.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business analysts, QA teams, and other developers to deliver high-quality, scalable software solutions.
‚Ä¢ Develop responsive front-end components using Angular for internal tools and dashboards.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, design discussions, and Agile ceremonies.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues in production and lower environments.
________________________________________
Required Skills & Experience:
‚Ä¢ 7+ years of professional experience as a Java Developer.
‚Ä¢ Strong expertise in Core Java, Multithreading, Collections, and Concurrency.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with databases (SQL, DB tuning, performance optimization).
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with Angular (front-end development).
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, and Microservices architecture.
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of software design principles and Agile development practices.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
________________________________________
Nice to Have:
‚Ä¢ Experience working in Fraud Technology, Investment Banking, or Financial Crime domains.
‚Ä¢ Exposure to CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, and Cloud platforms (AWS/Azure).

Please share resume at golu.kumar@excelonsolutions.com
